Name: Bending Blades cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tequila-based, zesty and bitter before turning bittersweet. In March 2022, I cut the volume of gentian liqueur from 15ml (½oz) back to 7.5ml (¼oz) so fans of bitter gentian my want to stick with the original spec.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Christopher Day at General Lee's in Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Bending Blades cocktail contains 179 calories
